alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Dukes (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 08 at 11:15AM EDT until August 08 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN DUKES...SOUTHWESTERN BARNSTABLE...SOUTHERN PLYMOUTH AND SOUTHEASTERN BRISTOL COUNTIES... At 1114 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lakeville to Fairhaven to near Gosnold to 8 miles west of Aquinnah, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Taunton, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Marion, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Somerset, Fairhaven, Duxbury, Mashpee, Kingston, Carver, Lakeville, Acushnet, and Freetown. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
